Text: Hakgala Botanical Garden:  The other four are Peradeniya Botanical Garden, Henarathgoda Botanical Garden, Mirijjawila Botanical Garden and Seetawaka Botanical Garden.

Text: Hakgala Botanical Garden:  It is the second largest garden in Sri Lanka.
